name: Shehu Sada🇳🇬 شيحو سد

name: Al-Ameen 👑 #TheInvestor👨🏽‍💻💰
tweet: Suddenly everybody realizes that Security became worse under Buhari.  Where did you keep your brain when we told you to vote a competent leader.

name: #SARSMUSTEND
tweet: Book of lamentation chapter 1 vs 2. She is crying 😭 out because her brother was kidnapped if not she wouldn’t have said anything. One by one and turn by turn all Buhari supporters will feel the heat.

name: Ibrahim muhammed
tweet: @onyeamahemma @jacksonpbn My uncle was also kidnap and we had to sale our belongings to give him freedom that was in 2016. Despite that people still see Buhari as the messiah and had to vote him in 2019. Well less next level begins.

name: 🔺Jimmy Legs🔻
tweet: @YoungOtutu @SuAbdulrasheed @HassanBadema It seems Buhari's name alone can melt twitter server due to increased level of criticisms from the newly recruited wailers. 😁😁

name: ADEWALE, Ahmed A.
tweet: Jubril of Sudan throwing shade at Buhari of Daura.

name: Anas
tweet: One of the reasons why I overlooked Buhari’s flaws and voted him is now even clearer than ever in the Zamfara crisis. These people believe “Zamfarans” deserve what they are witnessing.   My “Zamfarans” is in quote for a reason.   A

name: Gambo
tweet: Buhari is in Jordan and probably doesn't know about  the protest going on in his country.  Nigeria my country 😂😂

name: Order 66
tweet: It will be particularly interesting to here what Buhari has to say when he finally decides to speak up on Zamfara

name: Mubarak Umar
tweet: The Kannywood of today contributed immensely to the success of Buhari/Osinbajo during last Presidential Election. They pass message on govt. achievements to near and far. People listened and come out en mass to vote @OfficialAPCNg today we celebrate #APCVictoryDinner

name: usmanov
tweet: As far back as 2016 when the pressure from IMF was so high and tough, Kemi Adeosun told IMF in Washinton that "IMF may be a Doctor....but If Nigeria is sick, we will treat our self and solve our own problem" (paraphrased)!  Yea, Kemi was right, Buhari was right...YOU ARE WRONG!

tweet: Buhari will b d first executive president to govern  for four years without stealing public fund welcome to d next level. #ZeroTension
